content.query:
-- Create and load DimDate table
-- A dimension table focused on date attributes.
-- Provides date details like year, month, day, quarter,
-- and week, along with names for days and months, and a weekend indicator.

CREATE TABLE DimDate (
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

-- Populate DimDate Table from ExternalWeather

INSERT INTO DimDate (
    a
)
SELECT DISTINCT

FROM
    ExternalWeather;
GO
